## Page 1

COLOR CLAY
N
A
T
R
A
L
Color Clay®
CYDONIA
Technical Data Sheet:
Version: 05
Rev. date: 01/2021
Natural colour clay
INCI name: ILLITE
Product description:
All COLOR CLAY® products have some
common characteristics, like high silicate
content, and suitable particle size that provides
pleasant and easy application on the skin.
Aspect: homogeneous powder
Colour: quince yellow (ochre)
Odour: odourless
Properties:
Chemical composition:
SiO2
46.80%±5%
Al2O3
7.30%±5%
Fe2O3
2.04% ±5%
CaO
21.25% ±5%
MgO
2.48%±5%
Particle size:
95% particles: < 44 microns
Microbiology:
TAMC: < 100 ufc/g
(total aerobic microbial count)
TYMC: < 10 ufc/g
(total yeast and mould count)
Pathogens: Absence
Physical-chemical characteristics:
pH (Sol. 20% in water): 8.75 ± 1
Light stability:
· Natural light: stable
· Vitalux light: stable
Humidity :< 7%

## Page 2

COLOR CLAY
N
A
T
R
A
L
Color Clay®
CYDONIA
Applications:
· Facial or body muds, in powder form at
100%, for mixtures with liquid (water or
solutions with active ingredients) or in
combination with other powders in a
formulation.
· Facial or body masks, incorporated in
emulsions or suspensions.
· Facial or body cleansers as foaming
products:
· Liquid soaps.
· Peeling liquid soaps.
· Soap bars for deep cleansing.
· Gel-Mask.
· Creams and serums.
· Hair mask or special shampoos.
· Make up.
Special considerations
Generally speaking, all formulations need
a suspending agent to ensure stable and
homogeneous products.
Important!
Due to the natural origin of the product,
colour may slightly change from batch to
batch.
Color Clay® product range is distributed worldwideby:
DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U.
Santalo 152-154. 08021 Barcelona, Spain
Phone: +34 93 240 22 22. www.colorclay.com
gpt_manufacturer_or_supplier_reason: The document states that the Color Clay® product range, which includes Color Clay® CYDONIA, is distributed worldwide by DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U.
gpt_select_industry_cluster_reason: Selected Personal Care because the document mentions applications such as facial or body muds, masks, cleansers, creams, serums, hair masks, shampoos, and make up, all of which are personal care products. Homecare & Institutional Cleaning is not selected as there is no mention of cleaning products for home or institutional use.
gpt_select_compositions_reason: Selected Mineral because the product is described as a natural colour clay with chemical composition including SiO2, Al2O3, Fe2O3, CaO, and MgO, which are mineral oxides. No mention of biomolecules, derived natural extracts, synthetic or vegetal ingredients is present.
gpt_select_functions_reason: Selected Cleanser because the document explicitly mentions the product's use in facial or body cleansers such as liquid soaps, peeling liquid soaps, and soap bars for deep cleansing.
gpt_select_applications_reason: Selected Skin Care because the product is used in facial or body muds, masks, creams, serums, and cleansers as mentioned in the Applications section. Selected Soap & Bath because it is used in liquid soaps, peeling liquid soaps, and soap bars for deep cleansing. Selected Hair Care because it is used in hair masks or special shampoos. Selected Spa & Wellness because the product is used in facial or body muds and masks, which are typical spa and wellness applications.
gpt_cas_from_doc_reason: The document provides detailed technical and compositional information about Color Clay® CYDONIA, including chemical composition and physical properties, but does not mention any CAS Registry Number.
gpt_physical_form_reason: Selected Powder because the document explicitly mentions the product's aspect as 'homogeneous powder' and describes its use in powder form in various applications.
gpt_gen_product_description: Color Clay® CYDONIA is a natural quince yellow (ochre) homogeneous powder composed mainly of illite clay with high silicate content. It features fine particles mostly under 44 microns, an odourless profile, and a slightly alkaline pH. This stable, natural clay is ideal for facial and body masks, cleansers, creams, and hair care products, offering easy application and versatility in cosmetic formulations.
gpt_recommended_dosage_answer: powder form at 100%, for mixtures with liquid (water or solutions with active ingredients) or in combination with other powders in a formulation
gpt_recommended_dosage_reason: Dosage is 'powder form at 100%, for mixtures with liquid (water or solutions with active ingredients) or in combination with other powders in a formulation' because it's mentioned under Applications in the document.
gpt_certifications_reason: No certifications related to Color Clay® CYDONIA from DKSH Marketing Services Spain, S.A.U. are mentioned in the provided document or image.
gpt_claims_reason: No explicit claims or indications related to any of the listed properties or benefits are mentioned in the provided document for Color Clay® CYDONIA. The document only describes the chemical composition, physical properties, microbiology, and possible applications (e.g., facial/body muds, masks, cleansers, shampoos) without stating any specific functional claims such as anti-aging, anti-bacterial, moisturizing, or UV protection.
gpt_health_benefits_reason: Only applicable for FBI business line
